nodes.text: Eren Garai was a Human male proctor of Phelar University and secretly an agent of the Imperial Seurity Bureau. As the person responsible for vetting anyone wishing to to make use of the university archive, Garai was able to ensure the historic items being researched were not used in a way that would enable sedition against the Empire. He was a thin man with a shaved head to accommodate a cybernetic brain implant.
